CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Strong and broad photo - to - current responses were observed in the range from 330 to 780 nm in all of these PSCs , in which the absorption above 650 nm was attributed to the polymer aggregationinduced absorption broadening.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! In this paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Material Name" entities:

1. PSCs - This stands for "photochromic sensitizers," which is a type of material used in the study.
2. polymer - This refers to the polymer material that is being studied.
3. aggregation-induced absorption broadening - This is a phenomenon that occurs in some materials, including polymers, where the absorption of light is affected by the aggregation of the material's molecules.

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PSCs (photochromic sensitizers)
2. polymer
3. aggregation-induced absorption broadening
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

1. PSCs
2. polymer

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSCs |
| polymer |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
